department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is seeking offers to provide confectionary/food items to Edmonton Institution for Women. Tender closing deadline is February 08, 2024.
full_summary:
**Tender Notice**
================================

### Government Tender Announcement

The Government of Canada through the Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is issuing a Request for Standing Offer (RFSEO) for the provision of confectionary and food items to the Edmonton Institution for Women operated by the Correctional Service Canada.

### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** WS4138609713
* **Classification:** 50192100 - Snack foods
* **Location:** Edmonton, Alberta
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Notice Type:** Request for Standing Offer
* **Notice Date:** January 23, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 8, 2024, (2:00 PM EST)
* **Classification:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** March 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** September 28, 2026

### Solicitation Information

This solicitation seeks offers from qualified Offerors for the provision of confectionary and food items. The contract will be awarded to the Offeror with the lowest price.

The Government requires the following information to be included in each Offer:

* A detailed description of the Offeror's Company and its Capacity to fulfill the requirements of this RFSEO
* A list of all items to be supplied to the Government, including quantities and prices
* A detailed description of the Offeror's ability to deliver the items on time and in the quantity specified
* A list of all relevant certifications and licenses held by the Offeror
* Any other relevant information that the Offeror considers to be material in assessing its Offer

### Important Note

Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Canada Buys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by February 8, 2024 at 14:00 EST. All bids submitted after 14:00 EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or require clarification, contact Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC) by email at oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

### Document Attachments

There are no attachments to this solicitation.

### Notice URL

For more information, please visit https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18596882?extsite=MTg1OTY4ODJfQU4wMTQ4
